items.title: ComputerCavalry: IT System Administrator (Group Policy)

items.title: Projects in Linux - Learn Linux Doing Real World Projects

objectives_summary: Learn to install differt Linux flavours and tinker with it
Learn to use Linux as a backup or streaming server
Learn to create Linux clusters for real world applications

items.title: Foreman With Puppet For Linux / Windows For DevOps
items.headline: IT Automation
objectives_summary: Automate Linux deployment on Virtual and Physical environment using Foreman.
Manage Linux and Windows OS using Puppet through Foreman Web Interface.
Monitor and Audit OS environment using Foreman.

objectives_summary: Be able to build Real-time applications
Be able to understand how a Real-Time Kernel works
Be able to understand how the First Come First Served Scheduler worsk

items.title: Ultimate Linux Commands to crack L3 Tech Support Interview
items.headline: Linux command line-L3 Tech support Real Life Scenarios.
objectives_summary: Have clear understanding of Linux commands(korn shell and Bash shell) or unix commands and use the commands with confidence in real time Tech Support scenarios

items.title: UNIX/Linux Operating system - Beginner to Advanced
items.headline: Complete Unix/Linux OS learning with BASH
objectives_summary: Learn about UNIX/Linux Operating System and its working in detail
Learn to install Ubuntu Linux from ISO and pre built images with Oracle VM
Complete Linux Architecture

items.title: Windows PowerShell Hands On Training for Beginners
items.headline: Learn Windows PowerShell by hands on practice exercises | A Short & Crisp Introduction to Scripting
objectives_summary: Full of hands-on instructions, interesting and illustrative examples, clear explanations
Learn an important and mandatory skill for Windows Server Administration
Introduction to scripting world using Windows PowerShell scripting

items.headline: Learn how to start using Unix and the basics of shell programming in this simple and step by step course

items.title: VMware vSphere Virtualization from scratch
items.headline: Learn VMware vSphere virtualization platform from basics !!
objectives_summary: At the end of this course you will have excellent theoretical and practical knowledge of server and desktop virtualization
Understand and configure virtual and physical networking

How to create and configure Standard Virtual Switches
How to work with advanced vSwitch settings like Security and Jumbo Frames

items.title: ComputerCavalry: IT Backup Administrator
items.headline: How to properly configure a backup infrastructure for Full, Incremental, and differential backups along with restoring.
objectives_summary: Properly configure Backups

items.title: Advance IT Troubleshooting for Desktop Support Professional

objectives_summary: You'll learn some easy solution for complex problems which you face in IT Support jobs.
You'll feel confident by learning and resolving most common problems related to systems.

items.title: Windows Server 2016 -- Certification 70-742 Training

items.title: Computer Repair & Help Desk for Beginners
items.headline: The Beginner's Guide to Navigating and Understanding Your PC: Learn Windows 10 Basics, How to Back-Up Data, & more!
objectives_summary: Navigate Windows to locate files, documents, and tools more efficiently.
Use General maintenance tools to speed up your PC.
Backup files and documents and become familiar with 3rd Party Backup software vendors.
